title: Inflation rate in Zimbabwe 2024
yAxis: Inflation rate compared to previous year
summary: In general Inflation rate compared to previous year has rose over the Year.

The line drastically increased by 9.7 times from Year 1990 to 1991,remained stable by 4.4 times from Year 1991 to 1992,remained stable by 7.9 times from Year 1992 to 1993,increased by 7.3 times from Year 1993 to 1994,increased by 5.5 times from Year 1994 to 1995,remained stable by 6.2 times from Year 1996 to 1997,increased by 28.9 times from Year 1997 to 1998,increased by 8.3 times from Year 2000 to 2001,remained stable by 4.0 times from Year 2002 to 2003,increased by 13.3 times from Year 2003 to 2004,remained stable by 3.6 times from Year 2004 to 2005,remained stable by 2.2 times from Year 2006 to 2007,remained stable by 2.2 times from Year 2007 to 2008,remained stable by 25.2 times from Year 2008 to 2009,remained stable by 7.8 times from Year 2013 to 2014, and lastly, increased by 11.5 times from Year 2014 to 2015.
Maximum Inflation rate compared to previous year, about 156.96 was reported at Year 2008
Minimum Inflation rate compared to previous year about 0.21 was reached at Year 2014
